item.title: Man Utd confirm Rúben Amorim XI vs Southampton as Joshua Zirkzee benched - UtdDistrict
item.description:
Man Utd Confirm Rúben Amorim XI vs Southampton as Joshua Zirkzee benched

Date: January 13, 2025 | Source: UtdDistrict

Manchester United welcomes Southampton to Old Trafford in a Premier League encounter, with Rúben Amorim choosing not to start Joshua Zirkzee.

  • United hopes to regain momentum after a difficult end to 2024, struggling with four consecutive losses.
  • The team recently achieved a 2-2 draw against Liverpool and a dramatic FA Cup win against Arsenal.
  • United currently sits 13th in the league and is looking to build on crucial home matches.
  • Key line-ups: United's starting XI includes Onana, Yoro, and Højlund, while Southampton starts Ramsdale and Ugochukwu.
“With two weeks of intensive training behind them, fans are hopeful that the team will start to find consistency.”

The match against Southampton is a vital opportunity for Manchester United to improve their league standing and build team identity.

item.title: Ruthless Vidarbha outplay Maharashtra to book final berth - Cricbuzz
item.description:
Vidarbha Advances to Vijay Hazare Trophy Final with Convincing Win over Maharashtra

Published on: Thu, Jan 16, 2025, 06:17 PM Source: Cricbuzz

Vidarbha secured their place in the final of the Vijay Hazare Trophy with a dominant 69-run victory over Maharashtra.

  • Vidarbha batted first and scored 380 runs, largely driven by contributions from Yash Rathod (116) and Dhruv Shorey (114).
  • Karun Nair played a crucial innings, remaining unbeaten on 88 and helping to accelerate the score in the final overs.
  • Maharashtra struggled in their reply, finishing with 311 runs, unable to keep up with the required run rate.
  • Arshin Kulkarni top-scored for Maharashtra with 90 runs, but the team fell short of the target.
"Vidarbha 380/3 (Yash Rathod 116, Dhruv Shorey 114, Karun Nair 88*; Mukesh Choudhary 2-80) beat Maharashtra 311/7 (Arshin Kulkarni 90, Ankit Bawne 50; Darshan Nalkande 3-64) by 61 runs."

This victory allows Vidarbha to advance confidently to the final, showcasing strong performances from their top-order batsmen.

item.title: Man Utd confirmed squad members vs Southampton as Harry Maguire decision made - UtdDistrict
item.description:
Manchester United Squad Confirmed Ahead of Southampton Match

Publication Date: 2024-09-14

Source: UtdDistrict

Image:

Manchester United’s squad has arrived at Old Trafford for their Premier League match against Southampton, where they aim to continue their recent good form.

  • After a tough spell of four consecutive defeats, United managed a crucial draw against Liverpool and a penalty win against Arsenal.
  • Harry Maguire, who played despite illness, has been included in the squad for the match.
  • The team faces Southampton, currently at the bottom of the Premier League table, and is expected to secure a victory.
  • The confirmed squad includes notable names like Andre Onana and Joshua Zirkzee.
“Despite the challenging start, the players’ performance and determination must be maintained.”

The upcoming match against Southampton is seen as a chance for Manchester United to consolidate their recent improvements and expectations are high for a win.

item.title: Spotlight on Kohli, Jadeja and Rahul ahead of next Ranji Fixtures - Cricbuzz
item.description:
Spotlight on Kohli, Jadeja and Rahul Ahead of Upcoming Ranji Matches

Date: Thu, Jan 16, 2025
Source: Cricbuzz

All eyes are on Ravindra Jadeja, Virat Kohli, and KL Rahul as they prepare for the upcoming Ranji fixtures scheduled to start on January 23 across various cities.

  • Jadeja delayed his return from Australia but is expected to play for Saurashtra.
  • Kohli, who hasn't played Ranji cricket in 12 years, may join Delhi's training.
  • Rishabh Pant is likely to be appointed as the captain for Delhi.
  • Uncertainty surrounds KL Rahul's participation in the Karnataka-Punjab match.
  • The BCCI has mandated participation in domestic matches for national team eligibility.
"Participation in Domestic Matches is mandatory for players to remain eligible for selection in the national team and for central contracts, as per BCCI guidelines."

The upcoming fixtures are poised to be highly publicized, especially if key players like Kohli and Jadeja are involved.

item.title: BCCI Unveils 10-Point Diktat After Australia Debacle, Threatens "Disciplinary Action Against..." - NDTV Sports
item.description:
BCCI Implements Strict 10-Point Policy Following Australia's Tour Failures

Publication Date: January 25, 2025 | Source: NDTV

The Board of Control for Cricket in India (BCCI) has announced a new 10-point policy aimed at promoting discipline and unity within the Indian cricket team after their recent poor performances abroad.

  • The policy enforces mandatory participation in domestic cricket.
  • Restrictions are placed on the presence of families and personal staff during tours.
  • Individual commercial endorsements are banned during ongoing series.
  • Players must seek approval from the head coach and chairman for any relaxation of policies.
  • There will be a maximum two-week allowance for families to join players on long overseas tours.
  • Players are required to adhere to specified baggage limits while traveling.
  • All players must stay for the entirety of scheduled practice sessions.
  • Players are discouraged from traveling separately with their families.
  • Disciplinary actions may be enforced for non-compliance, including fines and exclusion from IPL matches.
  • The policy aims to strengthen commitment and operational efficiency within the team.
“Any exceptions or deviations must be pre-approved by the Chairman of the Selection Committee and Head Coach. Non-compliance may lead to disciplinary action as deemed appropriate by the BCCI.”

This initiative reflects BCCI's commitment to maintaining professional standards within the sport. It seeks to reintegrate star players into the domestic cricket ecosystem, promoting long-term growth and success for Indian cricket.

item.title: Pant available for Delhi's next Ranji Trophy game, but DDCA 'haven't heard from Kohli' - ESPNcricinfo
item.description:
Rishabh Pant Available for Upcoming Ranji Trophy Match, Virat Kohli's Status Unclear

Publication Date: January 23, 2023 Source: ESPN Cricinfo

Rishabh Pant is set to join Delhi for their next Ranji Trophy match against Saurashtra, while the participation of Virat Kohli remains uncertain.

  • Rishabh Pant last played in the Ranji Trophy in the 2017-2018 season.
  • Ravindra Jadeja also makes his first-class return after playing last in January 2023.
  • Virat Kohli last played in the Ranji Trophy for Delhi in 2012.
  • Both Pant and Kohli are named in Delhi's list of probables for the season.
“Yes, Pant has confirmed his availability for next Ranji game...About Virat Kohli, we want him to play but we haven't heard from him.” - Ashok Sharma, DDCA Secretary

The ongoing speculation about Kohli's return to domestic cricket continues, with former players urging him to regain form through red-ball matches.

item.title: Karun Nair stars again for Vidarbha to set up finale date with Karnataka - ESPNcricinfo
item.description:
Karun Nair Leads Vidarbha to Vijay Hazare Trophy Final

Date: Not provided Source: Not provided

Karun Nair's outstanding performance, scoring an unbeaten 88 runs, propelled Vidarbha to a 69-run victory over Maharashtra in the semi-finals of the 2024-25 Vijay Hazare Trophy, setting up a final clash against his former team, Karnataka.

  • Vidarbha scored 380 for 3, with significant contributions from Dhruv Shorey (116) and Yash Rathod (114).
  • Maharashtra managed 311 for 7 in their chase, falling short despite Kulkarni's 90 runs.
  • Nair's explosive innings included nine fours and five sixes, showcasing exceptional batting skill in the final overs.
  • Vidarbha's win marks their first entry into the Vijay Hazare Trophy final.
“Nair's innings was a defining moment in the match, particularly his late-overs fireworks.”

With this victory, Vidarbha aims for a maiden title in the Vijay Hazare Trophy, promising an exciting final against Karnataka.

item.title: BCCI bars India players from taking personal hairstylists, chefs, security guards on tours | New guidelines come after India's loss in BGT | Inshorts - Inshorts
item.description:
BCCI bars India players from taking personal hairstylists, chefs, security guards on tours

Publication Date: 02:31 pm on Thursday 16 January, 2025 | Source: Inshorts

The BCCI has introduced new guidelines prohibiting Indian players from bringing personal staff such as hairstylists, chefs, and security guards during international tours. These measures aim to foster a professional and unified team environment following India's recent performance in the Border-Gavaskar Trophy.

  • Players must use team transportation for all travel during matches and practice sessions.
  • The new regulations are a response to recent team dynamics and are intended to enhance professionalism.
  • These guidelines come after India's loss in the Border-Gavaskar Trophy.

Key Quote: “The BCCI's stringent measures are aimed at ensuring a more professional and unified team culture,” reported ANI.

In conclusion, these new rules reflect the BCCI's commitment to improving team cohesion and performance as they move forward in international competitions.

item.title: Overlooked India Star's Average Hits 752 In Elite BCCI Event, Sends Strong Signal For Champions Trop.. - NDTV Sports
item.description:
Overlooked India Star's Average Hits 752 In Elite BCCI Event, Sends Strong Signal For Champions Trophy

Publication Date: January 25, 2025 | Source: NDTV

Karun Nair has made headlines in the Vijay Hazare Trophy, achieving an impressive average of 752 after his latest performance. His exceptional scores and consistency hint at a strong showing in the upcoming Champions Trophy.

  • Nair scored 88* runs in the second semi-final against Maharashtra, contributing to a total of 380 runs posted by his team.
  • He holds the distinction of being the first captain in Vijay Hazare Trophy to surpass 700 runs.
  • Nair's scoring performance includes two centuries, four half-centuries, and multiple unbeaten innings in the tournament.
  • After a challenging period of not being selected for the Karnataka team, he has revived his career playing for Vidarbha.
“Funnily enough I said I think I need to score a hundred in every single innings to kind of get noticed.” - Karun Nair

Nair's latest run of form points towards a potential comeback at the national level, making his upcoming matches in the Champions Trophy highly anticipated.

item.title: Meet Devisha Shetty, star India cricketer's wife who is a dance coach: Look at her luxurious lifestyle and educational qualification - India.com
item.description:
Meet Devisha Shetty, Wife of India Cricketer Suryakumar Yadav: A Dance Coach and Her Luxurious Lifestyle

Date: October 2023   Source: India.com

Devisha Shetty, the spouse of Indian cricketer Suryakumar Yadav, is an accomplished dance instructor and businesswoman. She is highly passionate about Bharatanatyam and has a deep affection for animals. Alongside Suryakumar, she leads a life filled with luxury.

  • Devisha is known for her expertise in Bharatanatyam.
  • She hails from a respected South Indian family in Mumbai.
  • Her educational journey includes prestigious institutions like R.A. Podar College and H.R. College.
  • She has carved her path in the dance industry while supporting Suryakumar's cricket career.
  • They share a luxurious lifestyle, including high-end vehicles and stylish homes.
“Devisha and Suryakumar share a motivating partnership, thriving in their respective fields.”

In conclusion, Devisha Shetty's journey from a talented dancer to a successful coach and her luxurious partnership with Suryakumar Yadav highlight her dedication and passion for both her profession and personal life.

item.title: Sky: ‘Gained momentum’ – Euro club will now increase efforts to sign ‘unstoppable’ Utd star after recent defeat - Stretty News
item.description:
Dortmund Increases Efforts to Sign 'Unstoppable' Marcus Rashford

Publication Date: January 2025

Source: Sky Sports

Marcus Rashford's future at Manchester United remains uncertain as the January transfer window progresses, with Borussia Dortmund reportedly ramping up their efforts to sign the forward following disappointing recent performances.

  • Dortmund is interested in signing Rashford amidst his unsettled situation at Manchester United.
  • Other clubs like AC Milan, Barcelona, and Juventus have also expressed interest.
  • Dortmund's pursuit gained momentum after their recent defeats, placing them lower in the Bundesliga rankings.
  • The club has approved the sale of Donyell Malen, indicating a need for new players.
  • Rashford has not played in the last seven matches and was last on the field on December 12.
“He is a player for Manchester United. He loves this club, but I have to make choices. It is what it is.” - Ruben Amorim

The transfer landscape is shifting as Dortmund looks to bolster their squad, with Rashford now potentially at the center of these developments.

item.title: WPL 2025 Schedule out! Holders RCB take on Gujarat Giants in season opener on February 14 - The Times of India
item.description:
WPL 2025 Schedule out! Holders RCB take on Gujarat Giants in season opener on February 14

Publication Date: October 2023 | Source: WPL Official

An exciting announcement has been made regarding the WPL 2025 season, as the defending champions, RCB, will open the tournament against the Gujarat Giants.

  • The first match is scheduled for February 14, 2025.
  • RCB will aim to capitalize on their previous success in the league.
  • The Gujarat Giants are looking to establish themselves as strong contenders this season.
"The opening match promises to set the tone for an electrifying season ahead." - WPL Official

This year's WPL is expected to draw significant attention as teams prepare for fierce competition and potential surprises in gameplay.

item.title: Man Utd 'inform Napoli' how much they will sell Alejandro Garnacho for as exit door opens - Express
item.description:
Man Utd Set £60 Million Price for Garnacho's Transfer to Napoli

Publication Date: October 2023

Source: Express.co.uk

Manchester United have demanded a staggering £60 million for Alejandro Garnacho's potential transfer to Napoli in the upcoming January transfer window.

  • United rejected Napoli's initial £40 million bid for Garnacho.
  • Sir Jim Ratcliffe’s management is under pressure from the Premier League's Profit and Sustainability Rules.
  • Garnacho has been identified by Napoli as a top target to replace the outgoing Khvicha Kvaratskhelia.
  • The player, open to moving, has seen his starting position become uncertain.
  • Garnacho's recent performance included an assist in the FA Cup victory over Arsenal.
United's top brass insist Napoli must meet their £60 million valuation for any deal.

In conclusion, Manchester United is firm on their £60 million asking price for Garnacho amid growing interest from Napoli as they look to bolster their squad.

item.title: Liverpool and Arsenal's next five away fixtures shapes concerning title picture - Liverpool.com
item.description:
Liverpool and Arsenal's Next Five Away Fixtures: A Concerning Picture

Publication Date: 2025-01-15 Source: Liverpool.com

Liverpool’s lead at the top of the Premier League has diminished to four points as they face a challenging series of away fixtures, while Arsenal is gaining momentum.

  • Liverpool has not won a league game in 2025, drawing with Manchester United and Nottingham Forest.
  • Arsenal won a critical derby against Tottenham, increasing pressure on Liverpool.
  • Liverpool's upcoming away games include tough matches against Brentford, Manchester City, and Aston Villa.
  • Arsenal’s fixtures appear less challenging, with Wolverhampton and Leicester among their next opponents.
“Given both Liverpool and Arsenal will be expected to keep up a strong record at home, the title could well come down to who performs best on the road.”

As the season progresses, the upcoming matches will significantly impact the title race, making the performance on the road crucial for both teams.

item.title: Hurricanes seal home final with last-ball win; Heat and Australia sweat on Kuhnemann injury - ESPNcricinfo
item.description:
Hurricanes Seal Home Final with Last-Ball Victory over Brisbane Heat

Date: Date Not Provided Source: Not Provided

In a thrilling encounter, the Hobart Hurricanes chased down the Brisbane Heat's total of 201 runs, winning by five wickets in a breathtaking finish.

The match showcased spectacular performances from both sides and had significant implications for the BBL finals.

  • Hobart Hurricanes chased down 207 runs, achieving the target with a six from Matthew Wade on the last ball.
  • Caleb Jewell and Mitchell Owen provided a strong start for the Hurricanes with explosive batting.
  • Marnus Labuschagne starred for the Brisbane Heat with a commendable 77 runs.
  • A critical injury to spinner Matthew Kuhnemann raised concerns for Australia’s Test squad.
  • The result was vital for the finals chances of other teams including Adelaide Strikers and Perth Scorchers.
“Wade finished as the hero with a six off Xavier Bartlett that sailed over deep square leg.”

This match kept the Hurricanes' finals hopes alive and has ramifications beyond just the win, highlighting the competitive nature of the BBL.

item.title: Retired Supreme Court Justice Arun Mishra appointed BCCI Ombudsman - Bar & Bench - Indian Legal News
item.description:
Retired Supreme Court Justice Arun Mishra appointed BCCI Ombudsman

Published on: 16 Jan 2025, 2:44 pm

Former Supreme Court judge Justice Arun Mishra has been appointed as the Ombudsman for the Board of Control for Cricket in India (BCCI), also serving as the BCCI Ethics Officer.

  • Justice Mishra was the chairperson of the National Human Rights Commission (NHRC) before his current appointment.
  • He has a long career in law, having enrolled as a lawyer in 1978 and served as a judge in various high courts.
  • His tenure in the Supreme Court was marked by notable controversies.
“His tenure at the Supreme Court was marked by various controversies, prominent being the Judge Loya case and the Prashant Bhushan contempt of court case.”

This appointment comes as a significant role within the BCCI, impacting the governance of cricket in India.

item.title: "If Sarfaraz Khan Leaked Dressing Room News In Australia, You...": Harbhajan Singh's Direct Message .. - NDTV Sports
item.description:
Harbhajan Singh Urges Gautam Gambhir to Handle Dressing Room Rumors Wisely

Publication Date: January 25, 2025 | Source: NDTV

Following controversies surrounding the India vs Australia Border Gavaskar Trophy, Indian cricket faces scrutiny over rumored leaks from the dressing room. Harbhajan Singh has a message for Gautam Gambhir regarding allegations against Sarfaraz Khan.

  • Harbhajan emphasized the importance of privacy in the dressing room, criticizing any public disclosure of internal discussions.
  • He expressed concern over the impact of rumors on the team dynamic and stressed the need for better communication between players and coaching staff.
  • Singh highlighted the responsibility of senior players to guide younger team members and maintain harmony.
  • Sarfaraz Khan reportedly did not play in the recent Border Gavaskar series, which raised questions about his involvement in these controversies.
“You should not talk bad about your own family members in the open, that way your family's name gets tarnished.” - Harbhajan Singh

Harbhajan Singh calls for unity and discretion within the cricket community, urging the need for internal resolution over public commentary.

item.title: India squads for Champions Trophy, England ODIs LIVE: Should India pick Karun Nair and Devdutt Padikkal? - Firstpost
item.description:
India squads for Champions Trophy, England ODIs LIVE: Should India pick Karun Nair and Devdutt Padikkal?

Date: January 16, 2025 | Source: Firstpost

The Indian cricket team is under scrutiny after a poor performance in Australia. With a chance to adjust the squad, players like Karun Nair and Devdutt Padikkal are being considered due to their exceptional form in domestic cricket.

  • BCCI seeks extension for Champions Trophy squad announcement.
  • Shreyas Iyer expresses his desire to be included in the squad.
  • Harsha Bhogle calls for an end to cricketers using PR agencies.
  • Karun Nair shines with recent performances in the Vijay Hazare Trophy.
  • Devdutt Padikkal emerges as a potential pick for the ODI squad.
  • BCCI to announce squads for Englands ODIs and ICC Champions Trophy soon.
“I never understood how he was dropped after a triple century. It pains me that no one talks about players like him.” - Harbhajan Singh

The selection for the upcoming tournaments is crucial, and performances in the domestic leagues will play a significant role in determining the final squad.

item.title: Report: Arsenal pushing to sign Benjamin Sesko in January transfer window - Pain In The Arsenal
item.description:
Arsenal Pursues Benjamin Sesko in January Transfer Window

Date: January 16, 2025 | Source: Twitter

Arsenal have identified RB Leipzig's Benjamin Sesko as their top transfer target and are pushing to sign the striker this month, according to reports.

  1. Arsenal seeks to sign Sesko, having reopened talks with RB Leipzig.
  2. The Gunners are interested in an initial loan with a buy option, but Leipzig prefers an upfront payment.
  3. Manager Mikel Arteta has communicated with Sesko multiple times about the move.
  4. Sesko is highly regarded as one of Europe's top young strikers, with significant potential for growth.
  5. Despite indications that a January move may be unlikely, the right offer could change Sesko's mind.
“🚨 EXCLUSIVE: Arsenal are in talks with RB Leipzig for Benjamin Sesko.” — Sam C (@SamC_reports)

item.title: Pakistan Announce Playing XI For 1st Test vs West Indies; No Place For Imam-ul-Haq - OneCricket
item.description:
Pakistan Confirms Playing XI for 1st Test Against West Indies

Publication Date: January 17, 2025

Source: One Cricket News

In a significant development, Pakistan has revealed its playing XI for the opening Test against the West Indies, facing a side they aim to reclaim their form against after a recent series loss to South Africa.

  • Mohammad Huraira will make his Test debut, replacing Saim Ayub due to injury.
  • Babar Azam will bat at three, following captain Shan Masood.
  • The bowling lineup is spin-heavy, featuring Noman Ali and Sajid Khan.
  • Khurram Shahzad is the only pace bowler in the squad.
“This solid core of experienced players will look to provide stability and support for Pakistan's batting line-up.”

The anticipated spin-friendly conditions at the Multan Cricket Ground will be crucial for Pakistan's bowling strategy as they aim for a successful start against the West Indies.

item.title: Spin-friendly Multan awaits WI as Pakistan look to continue home momentum - ESPNcricinfo
item.description:
Pakistan Prepares for Spin-Friendly Test Series Against West Indies in Multan

Date: Upcoming series
Source: ESPNcricinfo

The upcoming Test series between Pakistan and West Indies in Multan promises to be a clash of strategies, with Pakistan looking to capitalize on spin-friendly conditions.

Key Points:

  • The series comes at a low point for both teams in the World Test Championship standings.
  • West Indies last played a Test in Pakistan over 18 years ago.
  • Pakistan is implementing a successful pitch strategy aimed at maximizing spin.
  • Shan Masood will lead the Pakistan side with a few changes due to form and injuries.
  • Both teams are aware of their challenges, especially West Indies who need a turnaround.
“Home conditions are very important in Test cricket. We've adopted a certain style of play and pitch preparation, and we want to take the momentum of the England series forward.” - Shan Masood

West Indies will seek to adapt their strategy to tackle Pakistan's spin-heavy setup, which makes this series crucial for both teams.

item.title: BBL 2025: Match 37, SIX vs THU Match Prediction – Who will win today’s BBL match between SIX vs THU? - CricTracker
item.description:
BBL 2025: Match 37, SIX vs THU Match Prediction – Who will win today’s BBL match between SIX vs THU?

The Big Bash League (BBL) 2025 features a crucial match between Sydney Sixers (SIX) and Sydney Thunder (THU) at the Sydney Cricket Ground.

  • Sydney Sixers have qualified for the playoffs, leading the points table with six wins out of nine matches.
  • Sydney Thunder also made the playoffs, securing third place with five wins.
  • The match is scheduled for January 17, at 1:45 PM IST.
  • Pitch conditions indicate high-scoring potential, suggesting a target of 180+ when batting first.

Probable Top Performers

Best Batter: David Warner (Sydney Thunder) - 324 runs, average 54.

Best Bowler: Ben Dwarshuis (Sydney Sixers) - 12 wickets, average 23.42.

Today's Match Prediction: Sydney Sixers are favored to win the match.

item.title: Pant axed, Samson promoted; Jaiswal is Rohit's new partner in India's Champions Trophy squad picked by Harbhajan, Sehwag - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Pant axed, Samson promoted; Jaiswal is Rohit's new partner in India's Champions Trophy squad picked by Harbhajan, Sehwag

Publication Date: January 16, 2025

Source: Hindustan Times

As the cricketing world anticipates India's squad for the Champions Trophy 2025, former players Virender Sehwag and Harbhajan Singh share their insights on the final 15 players. Their choices suggest notable changes in the team, particularly regarding wicketkeeper and opener selections.

  • Harbhajan Singh advocates for Sanju Samson over Rishabh Pant as the preferred wicketkeeper.
  • Virender Sehwag recommends young opener Yashasvi Jaiswal to partner with Rohit Sharma.
  • India's selection process is closely tied to performances in the ongoing Vijay Hazare Trophy.
  • The final squad is expected to be announced by January 19.
"Sanju Samson is my choice. Sanju Samson would be the first-choice," said Harbhajan Singh about the wicketkeeper selection.

With these recommendations, both Sehwag and Harbhajan are contributing to shaping India's lineup ahead of a crucial international tournament.

item.title: SA20 2025: Match 10, JSK vs PC Match Prediction – Who will win today’s SA20 match between JSK vs PC? - CricTracker
item.description:
SA20 2025: Match 10 Prediction – Joburg Super Kings vs Pretoria Capitals

Date: Thursday, January 16 | Source: CricTracker

The SA20 tournament continues with Joburg Super Kings (JSK) facing off against the Pretoria Capitals (PC) at the Wanderers Stadium in Johannesburg. JSK remains unbeaten in the tournament, while PC hopes to improve their standings.

  • Match: Joburg Super Kings vs Pretoria Capitals, Match 10, SA20 2025
  • Venue: The Wanderers Stadium, Johannesburg
  • Date & Time: Thursday, January 16, 9:00 pm IST
  • Live Broadcast: Star Sports and Sports18 Network, Disney+ Hotstar

Pitch Report

The pitch at the Wanderers Stadium is balanced, favoring both batters and bowlers. Winning the toss and opting to bowl may be a smart choice.

Head-to-Head Record

  • Matches Played: 4
  • Won by JSK: 2
  • Won by PC: 1
  • No Result: 1

Predicted Playing XI

JSK: Faf du Plessis (c), Jonny Bairstow (wk), Wihan Lubbe, Sibonelo Makhanya, Moeen Ali, Donovan Ferreira, David Wiese, Hardus Viljoen, Gerald Coetzee, Tabraiz Shamsi, Imran Tahir.

PC: Rahmanullah Gurbaz, Will Jacks, Steve Stolk, Rilee Rossouw (c), Kyle Verreynne (wk), Liam Livingstone, James Neesham, Senuran Muthusamy, Kyle Simmonds, Eathan Bosch, Daryn Dupavillon.

Probable Top Performers

  • Best Batter: Faf du Plessis – in good form with 247 runs in the last 10 matches.
  • Best Bowler: Donovan Ferreira – two wickets with just 15 runs conceded in his last game.

Match Prediction

Prediction: Joburg Super Kings are predicted to win the match based on their current form.

Scenario 1: JSK win the toss and opt to bowl first, likely winning with a score range of 155-165 for PC.

Scenario 2: PC win the toss and bowl, with JSK still favored to win.

Disclaimer: These predictions are based on analysis and should be taken as guidance.

item.title: Danielle Collins turns public enemy in shocking WWE-style antics, brutally taunts crowd: 'Take that big fat pay cheque' - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Danielle Collins beats Australian qualifier Destine Aiava in second round

Date: January 16, 2025

Source: Hindustan Times

Danielle Collins, a former finalist at the Australian Open, displayed controversial antics after her win over Destine Aiava, taunting the crowd and embracing a WWE-style persona.

  • Collins won the match 7-6 (7-4), 4-6, 6-2.
  • The crowd supported Aiava, leading to Collins receiving jeers and hostility.
  • After her victory, Collins taunted the crowd, saying, "How about that?!".
  • She mentioned her plans to enjoy a "big fat pay cheque" from the tournament.
  • Collins will face Madison Keys in the next round.
“I might just take that big fat pay cheque,” Collins stated during her post-match interview.

Despite the hostile reception, Collins managed to advance to the third round and generated significant buzz with her performance and remarks towards the crowd.
